entities.description: Number of days respondent used meth to avoid cocaine withdrawal in the past 12 months.
Number of days respondent used prescription stimulants to avoid cocaine withdrawal in the past 12 months.
Number of days respondent used other substances to avoid cocaine withdrawal in the past 12 months.
Number of days respondent spent a great deal of time using heroin or feeling its effects in the past 12 months.
